CustomField.formula: IF( AND( OR(Owner.LastName="Friedhoff",Owner.LastName="Lesser",Owner.LastName="MacManus", Owner.LastName="Pelletier",Owner.LastName="Fortino",Owner.LastName="Hogan", Owner.LastName="Hogervorst"), ISPICKVAL(StageName,"1 Prospect")), Amount*0.08, IF( AND( OR(Owner.LastName="Friedhoff",Owner.LastName="Lesser",Owner.LastName="MacManus", Owner.LastName="Pelletier",Owner.LastName="Fortino",Owner.LastName="Hogan", Owner.LastName="Hogervorst"), ISPICKVAL(StageName,"2 Qualified")), Amount*0.16, IF( AND( OR(Owner.LastName="Friedhoff",Owner.LastName="Lesser",Owner.LastName="MacManus", Owner.LastName="Pelletier",Owner.LastName="Fortino",Owner.LastName="Hogan", Owner.LastName="Hogervorst"), ISPICKVAL(StageName,"3 Opportunity Shaped")), Amount*0.25, IF( AND( OR(Owner.LastName="Friedhoff",Owner.LastName="Lesser",Owner.LastName="MacManus", Owner.LastName="Pelletier",Owner.LastName="Fortino",Owner.LastName="Hogan", Owner.LastName="Hogervorst"), ISPICKVAL(StageName,"4 Proposal")), Amount*0.32, IF( AND( OR(Owner.LastName="Friedhoff",Owner.LastName="Lesser",Owner.LastName="MacManus", Owner.LastName="Pelletier",Owner.LastName="Fortino",Owner.LastName="Hogan", Owner.LastName="Hogervorst"), ISPICKVAL(StageName,"5 Agreements Delivered")), Amount*0.67, IF( AND( OR(Owner.LastName="Friedhoff",Owner.LastName="Lesser",Owner.LastName="MacManus", Owner.LastName="Pelletier",Owner.LastName="Fortino",Owner.LastName="Hogan", Owner.LastName="Hogervorst"), ISPICKVAL(StageName,"6 Negotiating")), Amount*0.88, IF( AND( OR(Owner.LastName="Lesser",Owner.LastName="Hogan",Owner.LastName="Hogervorst"), ISPICKVAL(StageName,"7 Verbal Agreement")), Amount*0.93, IF( AND( OR(Owner.LastName="Pelletier",Owner.LastName="Friedhoff",Owner.LastName="Fortino"), ISPICKVAL(StageName,"7 Verbal Agreement")), Amount*0.95, IF( AND(Owner.LastName="MacManus",ISPICKVAL(StageName,"7 Verbal Agreement")),Amount*1, IF( AND( OR(Owner.LastName="Friedhoff",Owner.LastName="Lesser",Owner.LastName="MacManus", Owner.LastName="Pelletier",Owner.LastName="Fortino",Owner.LastName="Hogan", Owner.LastName="Hogervorst"), ISPICKVAL(StageName,"8 Closed Won")), Amount, 0))))))))))
CustomField.label: Forecast Formula
